Career Mentoring

Accelerate your tech career with personalized guidance from someone who's navigated the path to success.

My Mentoring Profile

I wish I had a mentor earlier in my career. The right guidance could have saved me years of trial and error. Now, I'm that mentor for ambitious tech professionals who refuse to figure it out alone.

With 15+ years at Amazon, Microsoft, and Fortune 500 companies, I spot career blind spots others miss and show you exactly how to fix them.

Since 2020, I've conducted 200+ interviews, reviewed 500+ resumes, and guided 100s of professionals to breakthrough moments in their careers. I also founded mentory-sy.net, a free mentoring platform for Syrian tech professionals.

Your career is too important to leave to chance. Let's accelerate your growth together.

How I Can Help

Define Your Career Goal

Discover your strengths, map realistic tech paths, and create a 90-day action plan to move forward with confidence.

Navigate Tech Specializations

Get insider knowledge on AI, Cloud, DevOps, and Data roles—what they involve, salary expectations, and which matches your background.

Career Transitions

Get a realistic timeline, skill gaps analysis, and proven transition strategy from someone who's guided 100+ professionals into tech.

Get Promoted Faster

Learn what Senior/Principal/Staff engineers do differently, the unwritten rules, and high-impact projects that get you promoted.

Stand Out Online

Craft a LinkedIn that stops scrolling, optimize your resume for ATS systems, and build a GitHub that showcases real impact.

Ace Your Interviews

Practice with real interview questions and learn what answers actually impress, from someone who's conducted 200+ interviews at top tech companies.

Frequently Asked Questions

15+ years of real experience navigating tech industry transformations at companies like Amazon and Microsoft. I don't give generic advice—I share my actual path and apply proven strategies to your specific situation.

Someone who's been where you want to go. They should have proven success, deep industry exposure, and real experience—not just an influencer selling courses. The best mentors have walked your path and can guide you around the obstacles they've already faced.

Perfect if you're a young professional (0-5 years), mid-career looking for a change, preparing for big tech interviews, or building your online presence. Everyone benefits from mentorship—I've had multiple mentors throughout my career.

You'll get different perspectives, identify career blockers early, and learn from someone who's made the mistakes so you don't have to.
